fields.title: I recently had to have my computer rebuilt due to a virus.
fields.data:
!! Issue
I have another kind of problem with Firefox

!! Description
I recently had to have my computer rebuilt due to a virus.  I now have Mozilla Firefox with ABP and see that Firefox has a built-in phishing and virus program.  Do I need an additional anti-malware program?  If so, which one works best with Firefox?  Seems the more you put on these things the more trouble you have.

!! Troubleshooting information
ADP 1.2.1
Java Console 6.0.2.1
Microsoft.NET Framework Assistant 1.2.1

fields.title: Firefox 4 beta1 is not showing the new UI
fields.data:
!! Issue
I have another kind of problem with Firefox

!! Description
Firefox 4 beta1 is not showing the new UI (no Firefox Button on the left). It's exactly the same as FF's 3.6.8, minus the tabs on top feature. Also if I disable the menu bar, the UI get's screwed up

!! This happened
Every time Firefox opened

!! Troubleshooting information

SmoothWheel
Web Of Trust

fields.title: The address bar, back button, forward button and refresh is not visible.  How do I change that?
fields.data:
!! Issue
I have a problem with my bookmarks, cookies, history or settings

!! Description
I recently had to have my computer rebuilt due to a virus.  I now have Mozilla Firefox with ABP and see that Firefox has a built-in phishing and virus program.  Do I need an additional anti-malware program?  If so, which one works best with Firefox?  Seems the more you put on these things the more trouble you have.

fields.summary: Firefox version: 3.6.6 Operating system: Windows Vista

fields.title: Comment on thread 736751
fields.data:
__Menu Bar__ (File, Edit, View, History, Bookmarks, Tools, Help)

Press ALT+ V T M (CTRL+V T M on Macs) on your keyboard. This should restore the menu bar (Firefox 3.6)

__Other toolbars__

View|Toolbars|Select the desired Toolbar

__Other steps to try__

Try restoring the default set by going to View|Toolbars|Customize| Restore Default Set. This will put the toolbars back in the default place

__Safe Mode__

You May need to reset toolbars and controls via ((Safe Mode))
Make sure you completely close Firefox first. When you get to the Safe Mode window, select Reset toolbars and controls and then Make Changes and Restart.

Links:

((Menu bar is missing))

((Navigation Toolbar Items))

((Back and forward or other toolbar items are missing))

Hope this helps!
